str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pass through, spread (as a report). From dia and erchomai; to traverse.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A village, country town. From keimai; a hamlet.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From the same as therapon; to wait upon menially, i.e. to adore, or to relieve.
Everywhere, in all places. Genitive case of a presumed derivative of pas; universally.
